mapper.select: select * from product order by product_idx asc
mapper.insert: insert into product(product_name, brand, price, discount, detail) values(#{product_name}, #{brand}, #{price}, #{discount}, #{detail})
mapper.update: update product set product_name=#{product_name}, brand=#{brand}, price=#{price} , discount=#{discount}, detaile=#{detail} where product_idx=#{product_idx}
